title: GEEK LIGHTING Hoodies for Men Heavyweight Fleece Sweatshirt - Full Zip Up Thick Sherpa Lined
description: THICK HOODIE: This men's full-zip hoodie is made of breathable, thick shell fabric and features a cozy full body fleece lining including the sleeves. This light weight yet warm hoodie doubles as a coat. This fully sherpa lined hoodie helps to block out cold and chill. It offers the comfort akin to a mother's hug, providing ample warmth and peace of mind

SWEATSHIRT DESIGN: The men's winter zip-up hooded sweatshirt features a regular fit with all the classic details, including a drawstring hooded neckline and stretchy ribbed cuffs and hem. Two large front pockets are spacious enough to store your phone. The smooth full zipper allows for quick and easy on/off

VARIOUS OCCASIONS: Explore our stylish men's hoodies and sweatshirts, ideal for a variety of occasions including lounging at home, casual outings, short trips, outdoor activities like running and walking, or as practical workwear. Our zip-up hoodies for men are designed to combine style and functionality seamlessly, ensuring you stay cozy, and warmth all day long in any setting

VERSATILE STYLE: The men's hooded jacket pairs effortlessly with jeans, casual trousers, joggers, boots, or sneakers. In colder weather, it also serves as a warm layer under a down jacket or windbreaker, complemented by a scarf and gloves for outdoor activities. This coat is a great birthday/festival gift to husband, son, grandson, boyfriend, father or yourself

NOTICES: Please check the details and size chart before order the winter warm jacket. Please order one size up if you want a relaxed fit. According to Customers' feedbacks, we upgraded the zipper and stitching to make it more durable and added new styles to meet different aesthetics
